tool.name: Tadarida identifications integration
tool.description: Integrate identifications from animal detection on acoustic recordings
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
========================== Tadarida identifications integration ==========================
**What it does**
This tool allows to integrate identifications made by observers and validators and will provide an input for synthesis of participations.
**Arguments**
- The input is a tabular file, output from the tool IdCorrect_2ndLayer. - The output is a single tabular file with validated Ids
